name: EBM
description: Melodic and dancefloor-friendly take on Post-Industrial music that developed in the early 1980s.

children.name: Dark Electro
children.description: Emerged in the early 1990s in Europe, incorporating the abrasiveness of old school Industrial but with a greater focus on a horror-inspired atmosphere and harsh, distorted vocals.

children.name: Futurepop
children.description: Derivative of EBM, retaining its apocalyptic worldview but incorporating heavy influence from the melodic style of Synthpop.

children.name: New Beat
children.description: Emerged in the mid-1980s in Belgium; characterized by dark basslines, hard-hitting grooves and a slow tempo.
